comment: Nice start, less flavor on the finish

Good not great. Tasted it neat at a restaurant while eating a spicy chicken taco. In the being I tasted the mulled spices. After cleaning my palette some I could taste the wine and port barrel finishing. It had a licorice taste that hung on my tongue. I could definitely taste the rye. 
You taste results may differ.

Tasted this for the first time a couple of days ago. Nice color, nose has a little port and spices. Smooth first sip with honey and cinnamon and long finish. Not much rye spice that I was able to discern. A good sipping whisky.
